content: Property Asked by AnonymousAsked on 21 Aug 2019Advice needed on purchasing a BTO in the West?Hi there, Here are the main concerns: The Tengah MRT will be out of reach, have to travel to Boon Lay, CCK, Jurong East, before reaching other places.It will take too long for the site to get developed, for example, 7 years before the light blue line is built.It will take some time before the site is ready to move in, have to stay in parent place or rent a flat first.Appreciate any advice you guys have!1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Zen Rogue XuanLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 26 Aug 2019Hi OP,Congrats on taking the first step to owning your home. As you mentioned, Tengah will indeed take a while to be developed- personally, I view it as the Punggol of the West. Do consider other BTO estates that will be made available: I heard that the Nov 19 Yio Chu Kang BTO based on the site of Chao Yang School, behind Presbyterian High School has garnered quite a bit of interest. You seem to be in the same shoes as a question I answered earlier, so do take a look at the answers: https://seedly.sg/questions/need-advice-on-getting-a-resale-flat-after-4-unsuccessful-bto-applications?aid=18070All the best for your housing Journey!0 comments0
